players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I saw Bob last night and he seemed suspicious. I think we should investigate him."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Alice, your suspicion is misplaced."
Diana: "I'm the detective and my investigation points to Charlie as the mafioso. I disagree with his claim and suggest we investigate him further."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I saw Bob last night and he seemed suspicious. I think we should investigate him."
